name: Asa Hutchinson
summary: Former Governor of Arkansas and 2024 Republican presidential candidate who refused to endorse Trump, calling him 'morally disqualified' and unfit for office.

keyStatements.quote: I do believe that Donald Trump has disqualified himself with his conduct after the 2020 election. January 6 is a line in the sand for me.
Donald Trump is morally disqualified from being president again.
I will not support Donald Trump. I think he's unfit for office.

credibility.background: Former Governor of Arkansas, former Homeland Security official, former U.S. Attorney
positions: Under Secretary for Border and Transportation Security, DHS (2003-2005)

oppositionReasons: Trump is morally disqualified from being president
Trump's conduct after 2020 election was disqualifying
January 6 is a line in the sand
Republican Party needs to move past Trump
endorsement: Refuses to endorse Trump; ran against him in 2024 primary

sources.title: Asa Hutchinson: Trump is morally disqualified
List of Republicans who oppose Donald Trump's 2024 presidential campaign
